Class State

  • java.lang.Object
    • Others
      • State

  • public class State
extends Others
    Subclass of Others, is the class that determines Player's reelection, and provides the instance variables to determine the why the Player should vote

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      State()
      Default constructor for State, randomly chooses whether state will be a red or blue state,
      if a Red State the variables are assigned as:
      _extremismRight is 0.35
      _extremismLeft is 0.20
      _percentCompRight is 0.65
      _percentCompLeft is 0.35
      _hawkLvl is 45
      _careBearLvl is 40
      _average income is 35000

      if a Blue State the variables are assigned the same, excpet _extremismLeft and _extremism Right are swapped, and _percentCompLeft and _percentCompRight are swapped.
      State(java.lang.String stateName)
      Overloaded State constructor, it is the same as the default, except for two changes:
      The arguement provides the State instead of it being randomly choosen
      The extremism of the majority in the State is 0.65 and the minority is 0.50

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getMajority()
      determines majoirty party in state, 0 = republicans, 1 = democrats
      java.lang.String getName()
      Accessor method for _stateName
      int popularity(java.util.ArrayList<Legislation> legis, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String[]> votesOnBills)
      Method used to calculate Player's popularity in a State, based on bills Player has passed or Failed.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Overwritten toString method

      • Methods inherited from class Others

        addDems, addReps, getAveInc, getBears, getCompLeft, getCompRight, getDems, getExLeft, getExRight, getHawks, main, round, setAveInc, setBears, setCompLeft, setCompRight, setExLeft, setExRight, setHawks, voteLegis

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • State

        public State()
        Default constructor for State, randomly chooses whether state will be a red or blue state,
        if a Red State the variables are assigned as:
        _extremismRight is 0.35
        _extremismLeft is 0.20
        _percentCompRight is 0.65
        _percentCompLeft is 0.35
        _hawkLvl is 45
        _careBearLvl is 40
        _average income is 35000

        if a Blue State the variables are assigned the same, excpet _extremismLeft and _extremism Right are swapped, and _percentCompLeft and _percentCompRight are swapped.

      • State

        public State(java.lang.String stateName)
      throws java.lang.Exception
        Overloaded State constructor, it is the same as the default, except for two changes:
        The arguement provides the State instead of it being randomly choosen
        The extremism of the majority in the State is 0.65 and the minority is 0.50
        Parameters:
        stateName - name of state, capitalized, that is chosen by the user
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - exception to be thrown when user enters invalid state name

    • Method Detail

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overwritten toString method
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        A string representation of the state that calls the method

      • popularity

        public int popularity(java.util.ArrayList<Legislation> legis,
             java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String[]> votesOnBills)
        Method used to calculate Player's popularity in a State, based on bills Player has passed or Failed. Popularity then determines whether Player is reelected.
        Parameters:
        legis - ArrayList of Legislation that has been voted on
        votesOnBills - ArrayList of String[] that are the Player's votes, and the result, of all the Legislation in legis. Indices correspond with legis.
        Returns:
        An int which is the percent support the player has in the State

      • getMajority

        public int getMajority()
        determines majoirty party in state, 0 = republicans, 1 = democrats
        Returns:
        The majority party in the state, 1 == democrats, 0 == republicans

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Accessor method for _stateName
        Returns:
        _stateName
